data: Arrived at the site. Exploring with Zed.|2|2|7
Came across some scarabs. Zed doesn't like them. Gotta clear them out or we can't move on.|2|2|7

Cleared out the scarabs.

Investigating site further.|2|2|5
A number of boulders are in the way. Zed gave me some dynamite. Should be fun.|2|2|7
Droum received a set of cryptic directions from one of our sources. I'm carrying it with me.|2|2|7
Looks like someone left this chest behind in a hurry.|2|2|5
Found a Taiscrethean artifact, but we woke up a nest of scarabs! Gotta escape this place!|2|2|7
Valtiez's men tracked us down in the middle of nowhere. 3 against 2. We've faced worse odds.|2|2|7

We defeated Yutmo and his thugs and made off with the loot.
Now to have Droum take a closer look at the catch.|2|2|0
This is quest info. Let's add some objectives!|2|2|3
This is more quest info. A second page of it even!|2|2|3
Check out the older journal entries with < or >!|2|2|4;5
